title: USELESS OCE SERVERS!
body:
optus cable

internet works fine

i can login

WON'T LET ME RECONNECT TO MY GAME, KEEPS SAYING CAN'T CONTACT SERVER! 

FK U RIOT

USELESS FKING SERVERS

replies.body: A bit harsh, they are having some issues atm. happens with every game. I agree the time it is taking them to fix issues is a bit annoying but it can't be helped. If you just sit there swearing at them and filling the boards with this bs your just wasting their time reading it, time which can be spent fixing the issue.
